prompt: Generate a website for a video game studio. The website should be rustic and use blue as the brand color.
code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Rustic Realms Studios</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #3A5F7D; /* A desaturated, rustic blue */
            --secondary-color: #8E9BA9; /* A lighter, muted blue-grey */
            --background-color: #F5F1E8; /* A creamy, off-white like parchment */
            --text-color: #333333;
            --header-text-color: #FFFFFF;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Garamond', serif;
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            color: var(--text-color);
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
